description: Set the minimum duration in milliseconds of item and form commits to the server to be logged in Long Running Operations table. To disable logging, enter 0.

description: Set the minimum duration in milliseconds of item forms rendered in the server to be logged in Long Running Operations table. To disable logging, enter 0.

Header font color, 4. Tab font color, 5. Tab bottom border. For example: #1281C5,#1072AF,#FFFFFF,#2484BD,#148FDB.
